qolmat.imputations.rpca.utils.utils.toeplitz_matrix

qolmat.imputations.rpca.utils.utils.toeplitz_matrix(T: int, dimension: int, model: str) → numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.typing._generic_alias.ScalarType]][source]

Create a matrix Toeplitz matrix H to take into account temporal correlation via HX H=Toeplitz(0,1,-1), in which the central diagonal is defined as ones and the T upper diagonal is defined as minus ones. Dimensions depend on the modelisation: if each observation is a row or a column if row: H to be HX, if column: H to be XH

Parameters
Tint

“period”, diagonal offset

dimensionint

second dimension of H = first dimension of X

model: str

“column” or “row”

Returns
NDArray

Toeplitz matrix
